CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Birthdate), IF( ISBLANK(CC_FechaNac__c), null, IF( MONTH(TODAY()) > MONTH(CC_FechaNac__c) || (MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH(CC_FechaNac__c) && DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY(CC_FechaNac__c)), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CC_FechaNac__c), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CC_FechaNac__c) - 1 ) ), IF( MONTH(TODAY()) > MONTH(Birthdate) || (MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH(Birthdate) && DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY(Birthdate)), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Birthdate) - 1 ) )
CustomField.label: Edad
